definitions.title: adv. 1.
definitions.body: in older Heb. with an asseverative force, verily, of a truth Ge 42:21, 2Sa 14:5, 1Ki 1:43, 2Ki 4:14, with a slight advers. force, nay, but Ge 17:19 (P).

in late Heb. as a decided adversative, howbeit, but Da 10:7, Da 10:21, Ezr 10:13, 2Ch 1:4, 2Ch 19:3, 2Ch 33:17 (cf. Ar. balo of a truth, sometimes, from the context, nay rather Qor 2:82, 2:94, 2:110, 2:129, 2:149, 2:165, 2:261, 3:143, 4:52 etc.)
